work.summary: Assist and advice students who want to create an innovative project especially on Big Data.

Setup a local cluster at students' disposal
Create a python script to monitor computer utilization

work.summary: Provide an easy and reliable way for searchers to put their project on the LHC Computing Grid.
highlights: Package a project in a automated way with all its dependency
Ensure the safety of the packaged project for the Grid
